cd:Attribute.name: flag_meanings
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: no_error missing bad_pixel processing_error saturated transient rts underflow

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This field is comparable to the spectral channel quality flag in the L1B product, but calculated for the individual wavelength bands.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This flag contains the geometry-based potential cloud shadow flag (PCSF), which is derived from the the viewing and solar angles, cloud fraction, and cloud height, and the spectral cloud shadow flag (SCSF), which is a subset of the PCSF and which is based on the contrast parameter Gamma. The SCSF is calculated for 494 nm.

cd:Attribute.name: flag_meanings
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: no_error solar_eclipse sun_glint_possible descending night geo_boundary_crossing geolocation_error

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This variable was copied from the L1B product.

cd:Attribute.name: comment

cd:Attribute.name: comment

cd:Attribute.name: comment

cd:Attribute.name: long_name

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This variable was copied from the L1B product.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: absorbing aerosol index retrieved from the 354/388-nm wavelength pair

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: height at the centre of the aerosol layer

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: geometrical cloud fraction determined from NPP-VIIRS observations (NOMINAL)

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This geometrical cloud fraction is based on the smallest relative footprint size (scale factor 1.0). The definition used is: gcf = (conf_cloudy + prob_cloudy) / (conf_cloudy + prob_cloudy + conf_clear + prob_clear).

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: geometrical cloud fraction determined from NPP-VIIRS observations (RELAXED)

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This geometrical cloud fraction is based on the smallest relative footprint size (scale factor 1.0). The definition used is: gcf = conf_cloudy / (conf_cloudy + prob_cloudy + conf_clear + prob_clear).

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: geometrical cloud fraction determined from NPP-VIIRS observations (STRICT)

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This geometrical cloud fraction is based on the largest relative footprint size (scale factor 2.0). The definition used is: gcf = (conf_cloudy + prob_cloudy) / (conf_cloudy + prob_cloudy + conf_clear + prob_clear).

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: total ozone column from ECMWF model data

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: DU = Dobson unit, 2.687E16 molecules per cm2.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: snow/ice information based on ECMWF information presented in NISE format

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: surface elevation in meters above sea level, based on GMTED2010

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: land-water mask and surface classification based on a static database

cd:Attribute.name: flag_meanings
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: land water some_water coast value_covers_majority_of_pixel water+shallow_ocean water+shallow_inland_water water+ocean_coastline-lake_shoreline water+intermittent_water water+deep_inland_water water+continental_shelf_ocean water+deep_ocean land+urban_and_built-up_land land+dryland_cropland_and_pasture land+irrigated_cropland_and_pasture land+mixed_dryland-irrigated_cropland_and_pasture land+cropland-grassland_mosaic land+cropland-woodland_mosaic land+grassland land+shrubland land+mixed_shrubland-grassland land+savanna land+deciduous_broadleaf_forest land+deciduous_needleleaf_forest land+evergreen_broadleaf_forest land+evergreen_needleleaf_forest land+mixed_forest land+herbaceous_wetland land+wooded_wetland land+barren_or_sparsely_vegetated land+herbaceous_tundra land+wooded_tundra land+mixed_tundra land+bare_ground_tundra land+snow_or_ice

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Flag indicating land/water and further surface classifications for the ground pixel.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: wind speed from ECMWF at 10 meter height level

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This coordinate variable defines the indices for the pixel corners; index starts at 0 (counter-clockwise, starting from south-western corner of the pixel in ascending part of the orbit.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: offset from the reference start time of measurement

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The reference start time is the start of the day.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This dimension variable defines the indices across-track; index starts at 0.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: latitude of the centre of the satellite footprint

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: longitude of the centre of the satellite footprint

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This dimension variable defines the indices along-track; index starts at 0.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The scene LER must not be used as surface reflectivity unless the scene is absolutely cloud-free and aerosol-free.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: See section 9.3.1 in the TROPOMI surface DLER ATBD (S5P-KNMI-L3-0301-RP).

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The time in this variable corresponds to the time in the time_reference global attribute.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: time of observation as ISO 8601 date-time string

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: central wavelength of each wavelength band

cd:Attribute.name: flag_meanings
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: no_error missing bad_pixel processing_error saturated transient rts underflow

cd:Attribute.name: comment

cd:Attribute.name: comment

The SCSF is calculated for 772.0 nm.

cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: land water some_water coast value_covers_majority_of_pixel water+shallow_ocean water+shallow_inland_water water+ocean_coastline-lake_shoreline water+intermittent_water water+deep_inland_water water+continental_shelf_ocean water+deep_ocean land+urban_and_built-up_land land+dryland_cropland_and_pasture land+irrigated_cropland_and_pasture land+mixed_dryland-irrigated_cropland_and_pasture land+cropland-grassland_mosaic land+cropland-woodland_mosaic land+grassland land+shrubland land+mixed_shrubland-grassland land+savanna land+deciduous_broadleaf_forest land+deciduous_needleleaf_forest land+evergreen_broadleaf_forest land+evergreen_needleleaf_forest land+mixed_forest land+herbaceous_wetland land+wooded_wetland land+barren_or_sparsely_vegetated land+herbaceous_tundra land+wooded_tundra land+mixed_tundra land+bare_ground_tundra land+snow_or_ice

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Flag indicating land/water and further surface classifications for the ground pixel.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This coordinate variable defines the indices for the pixel corners; index starts at 0 (counter-clockwise, starting from south-western corner of the pixel in ascending part of the orbit.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: offset from the reference start time of measurement

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The reference start time is the start of the day.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This dimension variable defines the indices across-track; index starts at 0.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: latitude of the centre of the satellite footprint

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: longitude of the centre of the satellite footprint

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This dimension variable defines the indices along-track; index starts at 0.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The scene LER must not be used as surface reflectivity unless the scene is absolutely cloud-free and aerosol-free.

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: See section 9.3.1 in the TROPOMI surface DLER ATBD (S5P-KNMI-L3-0301-RP).

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The time in this variable corresponds to the time in the time_reference global attribute.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: time of observation as ISO 8601 date-time string

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: central wavelength of each wavelength band
